abstract: Multinational group of high-ranking Catholic clergy issues sweeping proposal on combating climate change ahead of United Nations summit in Paris; following tone set by recent papal encyclical, group cites ethical imperative of defending world's most vulnerable people from global warming's negative effects.
lead_paragraph: The appeal, signed in Vatican City by church representatives from five continents, targeted a widely anticipated United Nations conference in Paris next month.

headline.main: Catholic Church Leaders Issue Appeal on Climate Change
headline.print_headline: Catholic Leaders Issue an Appeal on Climate Change Ahead of Paris Conference

snippet: The appeal, signed in Vatican City by church representatives from five continents, targeted a widely anticipated United Nations conference in Paris next month.
